  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public java.sql.Connection getConnection() throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.sql.SQLException
      Get the connection to a database with the good jdbc driver.

      Works with Mysql Workbench for instance.

      Returns:
      Return the localhost port, the good Time Zone server (Europe/Paris). Thanks to it, hours, time are well calculated in the FareCalculatorService class. the admin login "root" and its password (generated thanks to a random keygen - 256 characters).
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is an access error connecting to the database for exemple.
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      See Also:
      FareCalculatorService, ParkingSpotDAO, TicketDAO

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection​(java.sql.Connection con)
      Method in order to close a ressource as the connection.
      Parameters:
      con - is an instance of Connection. Close the running connection.
      See Also:
      Connection
